thread.title: The Trump administration and the Third Reich
thread.title_full: The Trump administration and the Third Reich

title: The Trump administration and the Third Reich
text:
Image: (JUSSI NUKARI/AFP/Getty Images) 
Sir Richard J. Evans is an expert on fascism and a historian who's written about how authoritarian regimes accumulate power. He believes there are many historical similarities; for example, the manner in which the Trump White House has stigmatized minorities; Hitler's propaganda chief Joseph Goebbels was also an inventor of news; and Donald Trump and Adolf Hitler share a contempt of the courts and the law. There are also parallels in the way in which both leaders have been regarded as crazy and irrational. 
But there are differences.
